As a paperweight: Place a small weight on the end of the spoon to hold down papers on your desk.
As a plant marker: Write the name of the plant on the spoon and use it as a marker in your garden.
As a zipper pull: Attach a small zipper pull to the end of the spoon and use it to open your jacket.
As a keychain: Attach a small keychain to the end of the spoon and use it as a unique and functional keychain.
As a magnet: Attach a small magnet to the end of the spoon and use it to hold notes on your fridge.
